subject: Steroids
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, Oct. 4 (AP) — A federal appeals court has ordered Barry Bonds’s personal trainer to be released from prison by 5 p.m. Thursday unless a lower court again holds him in contempt for refusing to testify before a grand jury investigating Bonds for perjury.
